audioText: Vous entrerez tranquillement dans l'hôpital moderne pour visiter votre grand-père malade cet après-midi.
question: Where will you enter quietly to visit your sick grandfather this afternoon?
options: The rehabilitation center with specialized equipment
The senior living facility with comfortable amenities
The family home where he rests peacefully
explanation: The text states 'Vous entrerez tranquillement dans l'hôpital moderne pour visiter votre grand-père malade cet après-midi.' - You will enter the modern hospital quietly to visit your sick grandfather this afternoon. 'Entrerez' is the future form of 'entrer' (to enter), 'tranquillement' means quietly, and 'hôpital' means hospital.
source: Strategic conjugate coverage development - family hospital visits
